messages.title: A personal message from Heather Wheeler
messages.content: Heather Wheeler discussing her local connection, achievements, and the importance of securing jobs and improving services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring that the economy is strong, unemployment low, living standards and pensions rise, the deficit falls and taxes are lowered.
Supporting our NHS, improving education, fighting crime and ensuring that our many beautiful communities retain their identity.
Making sure that we can decide our future in Europe, control immigration and that only English MPs vote on our local issues.

mentions.candidate: Heather Wheeler mentions personal connection to South Derbyshire, her experience, and commitment.

issues.education: Heather is passionate about extending qualifications at school; discussing apprenticeships with Education Secretary.
issues.environment: Supporting local farms and the dairy industry in South Derbyshire.
issues.governance: Heather believes the Referendum on Europe is vital as well as stronger immigration controls; ensure protection from crime and terrorism.
issues.health: Heather is committed to our NHS.

politicalExperience.achievements: Achieved a reduction in unemployment, support for local farmers and businesses, and improved school qualifications.

contactInformation.address: Martine Allard, Paul M Allard, The Post Office, Main Street, Swadlincote, DE12 8EQ

images.caption: Heather Wheeler pictured discussing local services, with Education Secretary on apprenticeships, and supporting local industry.
